page.title: 17PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {Stuck In The Mud Somebody is "on". The others run round the playground. The one who is "on" tries to catch as many people as he can. Those touched stand still with their arms out. Then the other children run up and try to free them without being touched themselves. {British Bulldog Two people, (or one strong person), is "on".They call somebody's name out. he tries to run the length of the playground without being picked up by the person who is "on". If the person succeeds the rest of the players run down the playground without being picked up. If he does not succeed he is on together with the others who were "on" before. {Chaindog.}Someone is "on",they touch someone. They join hands and catch someone else. He joins the chain, etc.
